thread.section_title: Hotel Artemide - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Perfect hotel, great location
thread.title_full: Perfect hotel, great location - Review of Hotel Artemide, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Cat H
title: Perfect hotel, great location
text: This hotel is nicely centered to see the very many sights in Rome. Front desk was most accomodating! There is a restaurant on top floor - we wish it had been warmer weather so as to enjoy the rooftop oursoor bar seating. We ate there our last night because we had an early flight, and really enjoyed the entrees and wines.
